shout.body: "Sounds of Maynard Chanting 11 and Stepping On Grapes (In The Fibbernachi Sequence)" will surely be a classic Tool album. A single 71 minute long track, it's been promised to live up to Tool classics like Ions, Viginti Tres, Lipan Conjuring, and Useful Idiot (dedicated to all the people who actually buy Tool records).
